synopsis:

The men who work at 'Kenban', the gateway to Asakusa's Flower and Willow world, are called Hakoya. They support the geisha like managers, sometimes like family members. Of course, romance Between a geisha and a hakoya is forbidden.

Kozo is a novice Hakoya, and Koume is a geisha in her third year. In fact, the two were secret lovers.

Of course, in the future, Koume will have a danna (a favored customer who will provide financial support) and will be married (having a physical relationship with her danna for the first time), so her love affair with Kozo is like playing pretend. However, as they play at romance, they are attracted to each other little by little...

synopsis:
Sonidor is a dream artisan who enters into other people's dreams through physical contact and grants wishes that cannot be fulfilled in reality. One day, the emperor suddenly arrives at her house and asks her to wake up the crown prince, who has fallen into eternal sleep. Sonidor enters the dream of Marmel, the crown prince who is praised by everyone for his gentle nature and beautiful appearance, but somehow Marmel's dream is gloomy and desolate. "You were just going to kill me?!" According to the taste of the prince who hates people, Sonidor turns into various animals and finds the reasons why Marmel fell asleep one by one, and Marmel gradually opens his heart to Sonidor... "Your Highness, do you believe me?" Will Sonidor be able to wake Marmel from his eternal sleep?

(Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: Ai no Shirabe wo Koushaku to
synopsis: When Blake, Duke of Welminster arrived in St. Petersburg to discuss the news of Napoleon's advance on Moscow. At that point, love is the furthest thing from his mind! Then, invited to the home of an old friend, Princess Sonia, the duke realizes that the princess sees him as a potential husband for her daughter, Tania. But as Tania and a young friend dance for him, it is the friend, Zoia, and not Tania, who captures his attention. Zoia is a beguiling young woman whose mother fell into disgrace by marrying beneath her station, and whose father, a French musician, still lives in the threatened city of Moscow. Suddenly, mystically, the duke finds himself under her spell.

title: The Borderliners
synopsis:
After being gruesomely murdered, Park Juhyeon begs the grim reaper for a chance to find his killer. To solve this mystery, he returns to earth as a ghost and teams up with Choi Seongmin, a vampire who assists the dead in the world of the living. As they dig deeper into the case, Juhyeon uncovers some disturbing clues and slowly realizes that his past was less clear-cut than he remembered. Was Juhyeon really just unlucky to meet an untimely death? Or did he have a hand in his own bloody demise?

(Source: Tapas Media)

Seeing those gentle and beautiful eyes behind his glasses, whenever she visits she can't help but daydream about the joyous life she'd have if only Shirasaka were her boyfriend!! Fantasy flows into reality when Miri gets a lucky chance to go on a date with this soothing barista... title: Mizu ga Kooru ni Naru Toki
synopsis:
Contains 5 chapters and the afterword.

"Promise" and "Since You've Been Gone", which can be found in "Four Shoujo Stories", are included.

We open with a light-hearted story of a guy whose best friend is highly dependent on him on all matters. He tells his friend he can continue his clingy ways only if he were a dog. His friend goes missing, but then he comes across a dog...

The next two very solid chapters are "Promise" and "Since You've Been Gone". The former tells the story of a girl who keeps running into this mysterious young man whenever she is troubled. "Since You've Been Gone" is on a cheating man whose lover is trying to persuade him into taking a trip with her and leaving his wife for good.

Karino Yoshihito* takes the stage again for the last two chapters; we get to know more about him when he was 26 and 15.

*recurring main character in some of Nishi Keiko's stories; see "September" and "The Another Ocean"

Unlike himself, Karin is a bright and cheerful person, and for some reason, she is interested in Uruya and keeps teasing him. At first, Uruya is unpleasant, but he slowly becomes addicted to the pleasure and mysterious charm that Karin brings... Romeo and Juliet of the Taisho Meiji era!? Let the immoral romance where corruption and teasing are intertwined begin!

As the Heian period nears its end, Takasaki—whose lowly beginnings as the mere third son of a warrior family put him at a disadvantage in a society obsessed with rank and titles—has managed to climb the social ladder by spending the night with many a powerful man. Eventually Takasaki even becomes a favorite of the retired emperor himself. Stares of fear and envy have followed the gorgeous upstart at every turn, yet behind the gaze of Tomozane, the son of a powerful noble, lies a calm warmth, which makes Takasaki uncomfortable. But something happens that will change their relationship forever...

Kazuhiko Ezoe suddenly finds a mysterious underground space in his yard. When he steps into what turns out to be the very first dungeon in this world, he ends up activating the Dungeon System and learns from the mysterious beauty who appears to him, Akane, that the world is doomed to destruction if the 666 total dungeons that will be appearing in this world are not all cleared within 10 years. As countries begin taking measures in response to the dungeons appearing all over the world, Ezoe seeks out companions together with whom he establishes Dungeon Busters Inc., a company dedicated to clearing all the dungeons in the world! When it seems even heroic deeds in the face of murderous bandits will not please the strict matriarch, the young man goes off to become a civil servant. Yi-chan is very angry and bets that she will win Ching-ching in this year's "Manga Competition" otherwise the "Comic Association" will be terminated. At that day, she met a boy, Cheng-yio, who transferred to her class. Although Yi-chan did not agree, Cheng-yo moved in Yi-chan's house by coincidence. (Source: MegKF)

Sumomo just can't seem to find a guy that's good enough for her. Their lives change the day their little brother Mikio comes to Tokyo to live with them, just after high school graduation. They all become immediately infatuated and aggressively sexual with him. Mikio wishes they would just act like normal sisters, especially since they seem hellbent on ruining his budding relationship with a cute girl named Midori. title: The Ugly Duckling's Secret Pouch
synopsis:
Makeup artist Yoon Seol was involved in a celebrity accident. When she opened her eyes, she was in the body a heroine in a novel. For a moment, she was mesmerized by the beautiful female lead's appearance, then she realized that the novel was known for torturous confinements. In the novel, the heroine Lila is raped by three men. She was an unfortunate character who ended up being imprisoned and turned into an idiot.

"Happy-bad endings are not my thing! If it's a bad ending, it's a bad ending! How could it also be happy?" To avoid the original route, Yoon Seol—or rather, Lila—decided to make herself ugly with makeup with the use of a secret pouch. Ten years later. Lila, who avoided the original story, received a marriage proposal from an ugly duke. "Don't be too scared, I'm just being honest with you because you weren't honest with me first." But will her ending be a happy-bad ending? Or can is just be a happy ending?

This is the manga adaptation of the mammoth novel that revolutionized 20th century literature and philosophy with its unique vision of time!

Manga version of In Search of Lost Time by Marcel Proust.

Ishida Sara has arrived to be their new company commander, and she's determined to get their team in shape! synopsis:
Love Is a Beastly Business! Rumor has it that Princess Rosemarie is an antisocial shut-in, but the truth is far stranger. The young princess hides from the world because of a strange condition: whenever someone expresses a negative emotion, she sees their head transform into that of a fearsome beast. It seems there's no one in the dishonest world of courtly manners she can trust... until she meets Prince Claudio of Baltzar, whose features remain ever human. The two marry at once, but she learns too late that his human features aren't thanks to a kindly nature. Claudio has become a very real beast, all because of Rosemarie's accidental theft of his mana many years prior! Claudio's life and future are on the line until he gets his mana back—and Rosemarie would give anything to know how to do it. Will they break their mutual curse in time for Rosemarie to get home for tea, or will Claudio lose his temper first? Find out in this new romantic fantasy.

She doesn't deal well with young men, so she has created an "air boyfriend," who she imagines is always loving and supportive of her. Ria is approaching 30 without having ever really dated. One day, the little food delivery business is bought out by a Tokyo company. Ria and her chubby friend Kyou end up heading to Tokyo to work, sadly leaving behind the older workers.

Mistakes and misunderstandings crop up in every department Ria tries to work in (many due to the fact that people assume she speaks English, based on her half-Japanese looks), and she is despondent that she is failing to represent the people she left behind in Osaka. Finally, Ria ends up as a secretary. When she ends up in a meeting about food delivery to the elderly, she feels compelled to speak up about her own experiences. She is certain she's about to be fired, but instead, she is promoted to be the young company president's personal secretary. Ria is not sure of her job as a secretary, she doesn't seem able to make friends at work, and she has no idea how to deal with the gorgeous man that is now her direct boss!

(Source: MangaHelpers)

synopsis:
Open the box to give me light, breath life into me, hold me with your love...then forget about me.

Master, I miss you.

Master, I love you too.

Master, do you remember?

I'm still lying in that box waiting for you. Waiting for you to open it again, and tell me you love me.

Jiang Ziya returned home to find that the single child in the family had become two and no one seemed to notice.

Ziya has a strange left eye, one that could see what others couldn't. Most of the time, he would ignore it but this time something abnormal is happening in his home. He couldn't possibly turn a blind eye to this, could he?

There is no peace in this world.

Some dangers require just a 'glance.'

In the face of unknown, do you choose to see -- reality?

Note from the scanlator:
The artist has said that the manhua will only cover the first two volumes of the original novel, which concludes the case "Human Doll Contract."

The original novel is "Illusions, Lies, Truth," which is being translated by Prince Revolution!.

It is an escort request to "the mountain that was not recorded on the map" in order to collect information. The mercenary who has to protect his belly with his back and the novelist who has no choice but to hire him after the process of elimination. The journey of the two people, who are constantly swearing at each other, eventually gets caught up in a plot involving the nation...
